item.title: Utilizing state machines in front-end development
item.description: The state machine is a very old concept. In fact, it even precedes modern computers. Despite its respectable age, the state machine is a super useful computational model to have in your toolbox of modern web development. Recently, there has been a lot of buzz around state machines and especially a popular state machine library called XState.
